articles.description: Roman Reigns & Logan Paul will definitely be in New York on July 25. Rey Mysterio will celebrate his 20th anniversary by fighting The Judgement Day, and maybe we’ll find out when Edge will be back in the process.
articles.content: WWEs always viewed Madison Square Garden as their home court, so having big stars in the line-up for a Raw broadcast from the iconic Manhattan venue is no surprise. Make that show the brands final pu… [+1354 chars]

articles.author: Sean Rueter
articles.title: The set-up for Ric Flair’s Last Match is bonkers - Cageside Seats
articles.description: They throw everything they have into getting heat for the tag match, giving Jeff Jarrett & Jay Lethal a reason to make the Nature Boy bleed his own blood, and by extension a reason for Andrade to stand by his father-in-law.
articles.content: They finally got around to announcing the main event of Ric Flairs Last Match yesterday (July 18). The tag is a mix of expected names Flair himself, of course, and his training partner Jay Lethal and… [+3088 chars]

articles.author: Maya Salam
articles.title: Making ‘Aftershock,’ a Documentary About Black Maternal Mortality - The New York Times
articles.description: The directors Paula Eiselt and Tonya Lewis Lee discuss their journey in making the documentary “Aftershock,” which shines a light on a national health crisis.
articles.content: The film, streaming on Hulu, presents a litany of jarring facts for one, the explosion of cesarean births since the 1970s. The procedure, which is often more profitable for hospitals, results in sign… [+1049 chars]
